title: Lagarde to leave ECB early to allow Macron to pick successor, FT says
summary_full: A spokesperson for the European Central Bank says its president “has not taken any decision” about resigning before the French presidential elections
summary_public: A spokesperson for the European Central Bank says its president “has not taken any decision” about resigning before the French presidential elections

FR.label: neutral
FR.evidence: Lagarde to leave ECB early to allow Macron to pick successor
